name: previewController(_:frameFor:inSourceView:)
desc: Tells the delegate that the preview is about to be presented full screen or dismissed and asks for information to provide a zoom effect.
declaration:
optional func previewController(_ controller: QLPreviewController, 
                       frameFor item: QLPreviewItem, 
                   inSourceView view: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<UIView?>) -> CGRect
